name: Stardust Crusader
description:
IMPORTANT
Play in fullscreen, otherwise UI might overlap with the game.


Controls
S, D, F, J, K, L

Control on which line to play the beat.

You need to hit each beat, it's not enough to stay on the proper line!
Avoid being hit by red beats!

Music by FieryPenguin
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcvjjNb0TfK8z0VzctkVGVw
